scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.applet-devx: BPORT=46263 SPORT=46262; concurrently "hc run-local-services -b $BPORT -s $SPORT" "npm start -w ui" "./we_dev/we.AppImage  --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 1 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT" "sleep 10 && ./we_dev/we.AppImage --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 2 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/converge.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mem
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
